item.description:
Let's get together before the holiday rush...

Meet in Burlington Mall at 2 to do some window shopping and browsing then go for a drink and appetizers or early dinner. Suggestions for dining include Legal Seafood, or the Cheescake Factory/Johnny Rockets at the Mall ...other suggestions are Not Your Average Joe's at the Wayside Plaza or Papa Razzi also nearby...email your choice or post it next to your response.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Holiday Season Shop and Nosh
